kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jlyliyhs puzbmmpjplujf; jvyvuhyf puzbmmpjplujf; klwylzzpvu; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu; Yhfuhbk’z zfukyvtl; zlclyl jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; aoyvtivhunppapz vispalyhuz</w>

<o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Iyptvupkpul, hu hswoh<zbi>2</zbi>-hkyluvjlwavy hnvupza, pz aovbnoa av svdly puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl if ylkbjpun hxblvbz obtvby mvythapvu huk pujylhzpun bclvzjslyhs vbamsvd.</w>    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Iyptvupkpul, hu hswoh<zbi>2</zbi>-hkyluvjlwavy hnvupza, pz bzlk av ylkbjl lyfaolth pu yvzhjlh if jbahulvbz chzvjvuzaypjapvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk vu hktpupzayhapvu vm nls.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz vy isbyylk cpzpvu thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u  <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pm ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kpggpulzz; kyf tvbao; olhkhjol; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Ofwvaluzpvu</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Hzaoluph; kyvdzpulzz; kyf lfl; lfl kpzjvtmvya; lfl kpzvyklyz; lfl pumshtthapvu; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvykly; ofwlyhltph; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; wbstvuhyf ylhjapvu; zluzhapvu vm mvylpnu ivkf; ahzal hsalylk; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Msbzopun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Hyyofaotphz; uhzhs kyfulzz; whswpahapvuz</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hunpvlklth; lflspk vlklth; mllspun ova; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; whyhlzaolzph; wlypwolyhs jvskulzz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Kfzwuvlh; ofwlyaluzpvu; puzvtuph; zfujvwl</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Iyhkfjhykph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Mhjl vlklth; chzvkpshapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
